examples: She was able to identify her attacker.
Passengers were asked to identify their own suitcases before they were put on the plane.
Se pidió a los pasajeros que identificaran sus propias maletas antes de subir al avión.
Many of those arrested refused to identify themselves (= would not say who they were).
Muchos de los detenidos se negaron a identificarse (= no dijeron quiénes eran).
The bodies were identified as those of two suspected drug dealers.
Los cuerpos fueron identificados como los de dos presuntos narcotraficantes.
